arts.ttl: Maresca hails Chelsea academy duo after first-leg success
arts.sum: Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca praises the contributions of academy graduates Tyrique George and Josh Acheampong in their 3-0 Conference League win over Legia Warsaw.

arts.ttl: Report: Chelsea considering summer move for Tottenham striker
arts.sum: Chelsea are reportedly keeping a close watch on Mathys Tel’s situation at Tottenham Hotspur, with the Blues poised to reignite their interest in the French forward should Spurs opt against making his loan move permanent. Tel joined Tottenham on loan from Bayern Munich in February, with the North London club negotiating a £50 million option-to-buy […] The post Report: Chelsea considering summer move for Tottenham striker appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Maresca hails Acheampong and allays Palmer injury fears
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca declared that he “fell in love” with Josh Acheampong during Chelsea’s Conference League quarter-final first-leg win against Legia Warsaw. The Blues won 3-0 in Poland and are now overwhelming favourites to reach the semi-finals. The second leg is at Stamford Bridge next Thursday. Tyrique George’s first senior goal put Chelsea ahead and Noni […] The post Maresca hails Acheampong and allays Palmer injury fears appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Jadon Sancho sends Man United reminder with Chelsea after 'return' claim made
arts.sum: Jadon Sancho assisted twice for Chelsea amid reports of a Manchester United return

arts.ttl: Chelsea linked with STUNNING €100m transfer for prolific Isak alternative
arts.sum: The 26-year-old only joined Benfica last summer for €18m but his debut campaign for the club has seen Pavlidis net 24 times in all competitions, including seven times in the Champions League. Chelsea have been linked with a stunning €100 million move for one of the most prolific strikers in Europe although they could face competition from one of their Premier League rivals in any move.

arts.ttl: Joe Cole tells Jadon Sancho what he needs to do ‘more’ after his Chelsea display vs Legia Warsaw
arts.sum: Claims he needs to do one thing a lot 'more'

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca explains Cole Palmer Chelsea substitution amid injury worry vs Legia Warsaw
arts.sum: Speaking to the media on Thursday evening, Maresca was asked why he had taken Palmer and Tosin Adarabioyo off at the interval. Enzo Maresca has confirmed Cole Palmer's substitution against Legia Warsaw was planned and not because of an injury.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca says he 'fell in love' with one Chelsea player after win vs Legia Warsaw
Legia Warsaw 0-3 Chelsea: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Noni Madueke and Jadon Sancho light up Conference League
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca's Chelsea are in control of their Conference League quarter-final after beating Goncalo Feio's Legia Warsaw 3-0 in Poland on Thursday evening.

arts.ttl: Chelsea fans are all making the same point about Josh Acheampong after his display vs Legia Warsaw
